BuildType.Name: Yacc C Header File
BuildType.Description:
Used to generate a C source header file from a yacc source file when the C file needs to have a different name from the yacc file.
There is also a Build Task under available tasks with the same rule that can be imported into any build service that compiles C code.

BuildTasks.Name: Precompile
BuildTasks.Description:
It is used to generate a C source header file from a yacc source file when the C file needs to have a different name from the yacc file.
There is also a Build Task under available tasks with the same rule that can be imported into any build service that compiles C code.
